active_projects.description: Add plan file status verification to /implement GATE OUT checkpoint and make implementation skills more explicit about plan file updates. Currently plan files are not reliably updated to [COMPLETED] status after implementation finishes (documented in skills but not executed). Fix: (1) Add verification step in implement.md GATE OUT that checks plan file status matches task status and updates if needed (defensive backup), (2) Make the sed command in skills Stage 7 more explicit with error checking and verification output.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting all skill file updates for padded directory paths

active_projects.completion_summary: Updated 8 skill files (research, planner, implementer, neovim-implementation, latex-implementation, typst-implementation, git-workflow) to use {NNN}_{SLUG} format in path templates for directory numbers.
active_projects.claudemd_suggestions: Updated path templates in .claude/skills/ to use {NNN}_{SLUG} pattern. No CLAUDE.md changes needed as the standard was already documented in artifact-formats.md.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary with all changes listed

active_projects.completion_summary: Updated all workflow commands (/research, /plan, /implement, /revise, /todo) to use 3-digit padded directory numbers. Skills construct paths with printf %03d, agents document {NNN}_{SLUG} pattern, commands maintain backward compatibility.
active_projects.claudemd_suggestions: Updated agent documentation patterns from {N}_{SLUG} to {NNN}_{SLUG} in 8 agent files. No CLAUDE.md changes needed as artifact-formats.md already documents the {NNN} convention.

active_projects.completion_summary: Updated /task command with 3-digit zero-padded directory naming. All modes (Create, Recover, Review, Abandon) now use padded format and handle legacy unpadded directories for backward compatibility.
active_projects.claudemd_suggestions: Updated .claude/commands/task.md with padded directory logic in 4 command modes

artifacts.summary: Research report identifying 2 primary files (artifact-formats.md, state-management.md) requiring updates to document 3-digit padded directory numbers

active_projects.completion_summary: Defined 3-digit zero-padded directory numbering standard in artifact-formats.md, state-management.md, and CLAUDE.md. All path templates now use {NNN}_{SLUG} pattern with printf guidance for implementation.
active_projects.claudemd_suggestions: Updated .claude/rules/artifact-formats.md placeholder table and path templates, .claude/rules/state-management.md artifact linking and directory creation sections, .claude/CLAUDE.md Artifact Paths section
